title: Smart data models - Humidifier schema
description: A humidifier is a device that adds moisture into the air.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `Humidifier`.

application.description: Property. Humidifier application. Fixed: Humidifier installed in a ducted flow distribution system. Portable: Humidifier is not installed in a ducted flow distribution system.

nominalAirFlowRate.description: Property. Nominal rate of air flow. Usually measured in m3/s.

nominalMoistureGain.description: Property. Nominal rate of water vapor added into the airstream. Usually measured in kg/s.

waterRequirement.description: Property. Make-up water requirement. Usually measured in m3/s.

weight.description: Property. The weight of the device. Usually measured in kilograms (kg) or grams (g).

isContainedInBuildingSpace.description: Relationship. An entity used to define the physical spaces of the building. A building space contains devices or building objects. (BuildingSpace)

isContainedInPhysicalObject.description: Relationship. Any Object that has a proper space region.  (Definition extracted from DUL ontology) (PhysicalObject)

isSubSystemOf.description: Relationship. A reference to a system(s) that this Physical Object is part of.

items.description: Relationship. The class of systems, i.e., systems virtually isolated from the environment, whose behaviour and interactions with the environment are modeled. Systems can be connected to other systems. Connected systems interact in some ways. Systems can also have subsystems. Properties of subsystems somehow contribute to the properties of the supersystem. (System)

hasManufacturer.description: Property. A relationship identifying the manufacturer of an entity (e.g., device). The value is expected to be a string or a string with language tag.

hasModel.description: Property. A relationship identifying the model of an entity (e.g., device). The value is expected to be a string or a string with language tag.
